items.title: Prep to hit New Year fitness resolutions with Peloton’s Cross Training Bike at its second-best $1,445 Amazon price
items.summary:
Amazon is helping get you closer to new year fitness goals by offering the Peloton Cross Training Bike at $1,445 shipped, which matches in price directly from the brand’s website. It has been fetching $1,695 at full price since hitting Amazon’s marketplace back at the top of October, with only two previous discounts on the books going as low as $1,395, which we saw back in November during Black Friday sales. Picking it up here gives you the second-best price we have tracked at Amazon, saving you $250 and landing it just $50 above its low at this marketplace. You can also find Peloton’s more advanced Cross Training Bike+ down at a $1,795 low direct from the brand’s website, too, which brings along real-time analysis and insights.

items.title: Score VIOFO’s latest A329S 4K dual-channel dash cam with up to 4TB of storage potential at its $374 low ($66 off)
items.summary:
Through its official Amazon storefront, you can pick up VIOFO’s newest A329S 4K Front and 2K Rear Dash Cam at $373.98 shipped. This new model hit the market back over the summer with a $440 MSRP, which we’ve seen mostly brought down to $400 for long periods, while there have been many Lightning deals and short-term Prime-exclusive drops to this same rate since October’s Prime Day event. You’re looking at another of these falls to the lowest tracked price here, which lets you upgrade to a more advanced dash cam system with $66 in savings. You can also find this model’s 3-channel counterpart at $469.99 shipped, or browse all the brand has to offer in its storefront here.
